name: Unexpected Find
description: Local citizens discover a forgotten magic item while working on a construction site or while clearing out an old storage area.

criticalSuccess.msg: The citizens donate the magic item to the PCs as thanks. The item is either a permanent item or four consumable items (equal chance of each) of a level equal to your kingdom. The exact item discovered is determined by the GM. If the PCs decide to donate the discovery to the community, <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="2d4">Lose 2d4 Unrest</button>.

success.msg: The magic treasure is donated to the community; <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1d4">Lose 1d4 Unrest</button>

failure.msg: The found item is grudgingly donated to the community; <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Lose 1 Unrest</button>

criticalFailure.msg: The recovered item is stolen before it can be donated, found to be cursed, or turns out to be worthless junk. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Unrest</button>
